Startups

2002-2004, cathaia, Dublin (Ireland) & Budapest (Hungary)

Bringing networks to life.

A novel approach to build a network monitoring & management system using artificial intelligence.

Netlyfe, the product was designed to interact with its environment like humans do.

We had some very excited days with a crew of seven developers and three business partners.

2005-2006, arigato, Romania

Eclectic electronic music & events.

From dj booking, club events to festivals. A close look how underground communities live.

2007-, Smuff, Romania

A gadget & gizmo online store. Like Thinkgeek.

Bootstrapped and profitable from the first day. Probably the best online shop for gifts in Romania.
